segments.speaker: csr
segments.text: Thank you for calling Comfort Air Services, this is Sarah. How can I help you today?

segments.speaker: customer
segments.text: Hi, my AC unit stopped blowing cold air last night. It's going to be 95 degrees tomorrow and I really need someone out here.

segments.speaker: csr
segments.text: I'm sorry to hear that. I completely understand the urgency, especially with this heat. Let me get some information so we can get a technician out to you as quickly as possible.

segments.speaker: customer
segments.text: Sure, but I called CoolBreeze HVAC first and they said they could come tomorrow. Can you beat that?

segments.speaker: csr
segments.text: I can guarantee we'll have someone there today. We prioritize emergency calls like yours.

segments.speaker: customer
segments.text: That would be amazing. How much is the service call going to cost me?

segments.speaker: csr
segments.text: The diagnostic fee is $89, and that gets applied toward any repairs we do. Now, can I get the address where you need the service?

segments.speaker: csr
segments.text: Got it, 4521 Maple Drive, unit B. And what's the best number to reach you if the tech needs to contact you on the way?

segments.speaker: csr
segments.text: Perfect. One last thing â€” do you happen to have a home warranty that might cover this service?

segments.speaker: csr
segments.text: No problem at all. I have you scheduled for this afternoon between 2 and 4 PM. Our technician will call about 30 minutes before arrival. Is there anything else I can help with?

segments.speaker: customer
segments.text: No, that's it. Thank you so much.

segments.speaker: csr
segments.text: You're welcome! Stay cool, and we'll see you this afternoon.
